experimentName: By giving players the option to invite friends semi-automatically the number of players will increase.
assumeGlueLine: There will be a 10% increase in new players.
successGlueLine: Send cake to the whole team with congratulations.

experimentName: I want to validate that by showing the discounted rooms first, there will be an increase in booked rooms..
baselineGlueLine: Get the current number of discounted rooms booked per week.
assumeGlueLine: There will be an increase in bookings for discounted rooms of 25 per week in the first month.
successGlueLine: Send email to the whole team with congratulations.
failureGlueLine: Send an email to the Product Owner.

experimentName: As above (more baselines and assumptions for one experiment)
baselineGlueLine: Get the number of discounted rooms booked in the last 6 months.
assumeGlueLine: After 6 months, bookings of discounted rooms have increased by 80%.
successGlueLine: Send reminder to buy cake for the developers.
failureGlueLine: Create an investigative story on the backlog.
